name: jewels saga 9
description:
Jewels saga deluxe version, An classic Jewels Match-3 game launch on Android Market.
If you really like the puzzle type of game, you will like it.
Your mission is to win Jewels get best score, try to get highest score in the game.
How to play:
1: Swap to match 3 or more identical .
2: Match the jewels until the board transparency,the star will appear.
3: Make the jewels star down to last line to pass the level.
Tips: Eliminate more can get extra scores.
Features:
- Match 4 can get 8 stars.
- Match 5 can win 15 points.
- Match 5 can win star fireworks.
- 2 different game modes, more great fun, let's go and experience.Classic and limited mode
Jewels 3 is easy and fun, You can be a legend.Download free and puzzle right now!
